title: Status Updates
body:
Hi Riot Team,

I've noticed that status updates don't always sync.

The first time I changed my status message on the desktop client, and after a while it updated on the app.

However, updating it on the app doesn't seem to update it on the desktop client. Afterwards, even if you change the message on the desktop client, the app will no longer update to reflect the new message. This issue still occurs
after killing and restarting the app.

Thanks,
Luke Norris.
